page.title: 10Ghosts!
page.content: In wem there are four very well known ghosts. One of them committed suicide in the Castle Mound House. His wife died of cancer and he was so afraid of catching it himself that he shot himself in the head in his barn. Down the Ellesmere Road, there is a ghost of a milkmaid who walks across the road with no legs. In the Hawkstone Lake, there is the ghost of a baby who had been with her dog. The baby fell in the lake and drowned. Soon after that a vicar came to bless the lake because the baby was haunting it and since then no one has seen the ghost Most recently, a boy called Ben Phillimore saw the ghost of an old lady who stopped him going into his parents' room when he had woken up during the night.
